title: New WordPress backdoor creates rogue admin to hijack websites
description: A new malware has been posing as a legitimate caching plugin to target WordPress sites, allowing threat actors to create an administrator account and control the site's activity. [...]

title: BianLian extortion group claims recent Air Canada breach
description: The BianLian extortion group claims to have stolen 210GB of data after breaching the network of Air Canada, the country's largest airline and a founding member of Star Alliance. [...]

title: Microsoft Defender now auto-isolates compromised accounts
description: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint now uses automatic attack disruption to isolate compromised user accounts and block lateral movement in hands-on-keyboard attacks with the help of a new 'contain user' capability in public preview. [...]

title: Exchange Online mail delivery issues caused by anti-spam rules
description: Microsoft is investigating Exchange Online mail delivery issues causing "Server busy" errors and delays when receiving emails from outside organizations. [...]

title: Windows 11 21H2 and Windows Server 2012 reach end of support
description: Windows Server 2012 and multiple editions of Windows 11, version 21H2, have reached the end of support with this month's Patch Tuesday. [...]

title: Microsoft: State hackers exploiting Confluence zero-day since September
description: Microsoft says a Chinese-backed threat group tracked as 'Storm-0062' (aka DarkShadow or Oro0lxy) has been exploiting a critical privilege escalation zero-day in the Atlassian Confluence Data Center and Server since September 14, 2023. [...]

title: Generative AI Security: Preventing Microsoft Copilot Data Exposure
description: Microsoft Copilot introduces potential privacy risks as it can have full access to your organization's documents, email, contacts, chats, and calendar. Learn more from Varonis about Microsoft Copilot's security model works and the privacy risks associated with using it. [...]

title: Simpson Manufacturing shuts down IT systems after cyberattack
description: Simpson Manufacturing disclosed via a SEC 8-K filing a cybersecurity incident that has caused disruptions in its operations, which are expected to continue. [...]

title: LinkedIn Smart Links attacks return to target Microsoft accounts
description: Hackers are once again abusing LinkedIn Smart Links in phishing attacks to bypass protection measures and evade detection in attempts to steal Microsoft account credentials. [...]
